name: Invaded: Idle
description:
Oh noes! Not-so-scary aliens are attacking our planet! You must stom them, once for all! While idling, obviously!

Invaded:Idle is an idle game with a goal: stop an alien invasion by upgrading your defenses and going through the skyes to make it personal.

Some features are:

  • 3 phases with different resources to gather
  • idle gameplay without active play requirements
  • colorful pixel art
  • pretty short duration (a few hours)
  • auto-save
  • progress at game closed
  • easy game flow
Show them who's the boss!
